plot: The Ant Hill Mob has to protect Penelope Pitstop from a murderous lawyer who is after her inheritance.
plot_en: The Ant Hill Mob has to protect Penelope Pitstop from a murderous lawyer who is after her inheritance.
plot_es: The Ant Hill Mob has to protect Penelope Pitstop from a murderous lawyer who is after her inheritance.
title: The Perils of Penelope Pitstop
